name: Your Place or Mine
description:
Based on Mine Sweeper, expand your territory and attack your opponent, and you need to destroy all your opponent's territories to win.

Is the territory your place or a mine?

Views

Left view : Real-time display of territory

Right view : original map, just Mine Sweeper

Controls

Play with mouse, like play Mine Sweeper.

ActionMouse ButtonLeft viewRight viewOpen out your territory
